data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Weinan a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Weinan, Shaanxi, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Weinan, Shaanxi, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Weinan do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Weinan to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Hui, Muslim Chinese people. Make the Hui, Muslim Chinese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, encourage the church in Weinan, Shaanxi, China to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Weinan, Shaanxi, China today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Weinan to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
